author: wslyvh

Is there a reason there's no standardized API call that returns current txs in mempool? Most clients do seem to have their own implementations.. 
Geth: txpool_content
Besu: txpool_besuTransactions
Nethermind: parity_pendingTransactions

author: wslyvh
content: and curious what are the thoughts on how relevant the public mempool will be in the future as more and more tx's are going to private pools?
